html: During the First World War, the Army Post Office handled 2bn letters and 114m parcels, with up to 12m letters delivered to soldiers weekly. 75,000 GPO employees fought in the War, and tens of thousands of women helped keep the Post Office going. #LestWeForget @RoyalMailGroup

html: BUDGET 2018 (1/2) 1) Largest ever increase in NHS spending, delivered without any rise in personal tax 2) Ending of austerity with increases in public spending, year on year, for the next 5 years 3) Tax cuts for 32 million people by raising personal tax allowances a year early
text:
BUDGET 2018 (1/2)

1) Largest ever increase in NHS spending, delivered without any rise in personal tax

2) Ending of austerity with increases in public spending, year on year, for the next 5 years

3) Tax cuts for 32 million people by raising personal tax allowances a year early

html: I’m pleased to announce the Budget will take place on 29 October. I’ll set out how our balanced approach is getting debt falling while supporting our vital public services, and how we are building a stronger, more prosperous economy.pic.twitter.com/FKafI3kLO9
text:
I’m pleased to announce the Budget will take place on 29 October.

I’ll set out how our balanced approach is getting debt falling while supporting our vital public services, and how we are building a stronger, more prosperous economy.pic.twitter.com/FKafI3kLO9

html: Being spat at. Being punched. Being kicked. Assaults against emergency workers are unacceptable. They don't come with the territory. They're never OK. An attack against one of them is an attack on us all. Today the law changes to #ProtectTheProtectors https://www.gov.uk/government/news/jail-time-to-double-for-assaulting-an-emergency-worker …pic.twitter.com/OZUr2D2yqJ
text:
Being spat at. Being punched. Being kicked.

Assaults against emergency workers are unacceptable.
They don't come with the territory.
They're never OK.

An attack against one of them is an attack on us all.
Today the law changes to #ProtectTheProtectors

html: Little remarked, but UK Corporation Tax revenue in the last twelve months hit an all-time record high of £58.3bn today: up £10bn compared to the same period just two years ago. Corporation Tax cuts create jobs, raise wages, increase savings, and - yes - boost government revenue.
text:
Little remarked, but UK Corporation Tax revenue in the last twelve months hit an all-time record high of £58.3bn today: up £10bn compared to the same period just two years ago.

Corporation Tax cuts create jobs, raise wages, increase savings, and - yes - boost government revenue.

html: Just want to let everyone know that after a ‘no deal’ Brexit there will NOT - I repeat NOT - be a shortage of Forman’s smoked salmon. We’ve were smoking salmon for 70 years before joining the EU and will carry on 70 years after we leave. #WeAreSmoking
text:
Just want to let everyone know that after a ‘no deal’ Brexit there will NOT - I repeat NOT - be a shortage of Forman’s smoked salmon.  

We’ve were smoking salmon for 70 years before joining the EU and will carry on 70 years after we leave.

#WeAreSmoking

html: As I arrive in the , encouraging to see new @YouGov poll by Public First on UK-US relations: 67% of Americans support a free trade agreement with the UK 69% of Americans say free trade is good for their country 54% of Americans say UK is their most important allypic.twitter.com/dT8d4ZNqli
text:
As I arrive in the , encouraging to see new @YouGov poll by Public First on UK-US relations:
 
 67% of Americans support a free trade agreement with the UK
 69% of Americans say free trade is good for their country
 54% of Americans say UK is their most important allypic.twitter.com/dT8d4ZNqli

html: Today @SajidJavid introduces the Offensive Weapons Bill to: Ban the delivery of knives & corrosives bought online to residential addresses Make it harder for young people to buy knives & acid online Ban possession of likes of zombie knives, knuckle dusters & death starspic.twitter.com/8nnSGRdR0k
text:
Today @SajidJavid introduces the Offensive Weapons Bill to:
